ItemTooltips.blink: Positioning at all costs? This is for you. Although with some extra effort you usually don't need it.
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Best used combined with Ice Wall and Emp
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Best used combined with Ice Wall.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: If you're rich enough and the game goes late, purchase it.

AbilityTooltips.invoker_cold_snap: Your best friend. Low cooldown high damage, lots of interrupting.
AbilityTooltips.invoker_ghost_walk: While used for escaping, in this build ghost walk can be used for slowing down enemies when your allies are closing in.
AbilityTooltips.invoker_tornado: Your best long range disable, effective used before ice wall or EMP
AbilityTooltips.invoker_ice_wall: Teamfight changing spell, enemies without BKB will stay in their place forever. Ensures escaping as well when in narrow areas.
